lines.text: Well, there seems to be something missing.
Just the millions, and they can't rule you out for a technicality.
we should have been born with blue blood, so we have devoted our entire life to correcting this... biological error.
What do you do? If you're not, what are you?
Well, we're sort of an excess profits tax. To criticize us would be unamerican.
We are merely bees that take a little nectar from the flowers that have so much. And you too can have some.
